title: Color Wheel with Named Colors
description: An interactive color wheel displaying web-safe named colors. Hover over any color dot to see the color name, RGB values, hex code, and hue angle.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Web Development
Color Theory
CSS
Design

learningObjectives: Identify web-safe named colors on a color wheel
Understand the relationship between hue and position on a color wheel
Compare RGB values of similar colors
Apply named colors in web design contexts

accessibility: Screen reader description via describe() function

controls.description: Hover over color dots to display color information

displayElements.name: Color Wheel
displayElements.description: HSB color wheel background showing full spectrum

displayElements.name: Color Dots
displayElements.description: 82 dots representing web-safe named colors positioned by hue and saturation

displayElements.name: Info Panel
displayElements.description: Shows color name, RGB values, hex code, and hue when hovering

assumptions: Colors positioned by HSL hue value
Saturation determines radial distance from center
limitations: Does not show all 140+ CSS named colors
Grayscale colors not included as they lack hue

learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of color wheel with named colors
Explore color wheel with named colors through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of color wheel with named colors to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on color wheel with named colors
